columns.text: Located in the heart of Santorini, a few kilometers from Fira, the capital of the island, A&V villa is the perfect location for those seeking peace, luxury and comfort. Spacious and modern, built on three levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool, the villa offers privacy, without sacrificing the comforts found in a five-star hotel. It is the ideal setting for a lifetime trip for family get-togethers and parties of friends. Bright ample rooms are the main characteristic of the villa. Two fully equipped kitchens, a large living room and an elegant dining room allow the guests to gather and enjoy a traditional meal in the cozy atmosphere of the villa away from the daily crowd. Four comfortable bedrooms, each one featuring a king size bed and three fully renovated bathrooms (one for each level) are the perfect compromise to combine some privacy with the advantage of sharing a private luxury home with your love ones. The outdoor area features a private infinity pool, full sea views on the East coast of the island and an astonishing sunrise. A shaded lounge area under a pergola and sun beds and outdoor lighting for moonlight dinners.

items.title: Sea View Villa
items.amenities:
• 4 bedrooms
  • 3 bathrooms
  • 4 double beds
  • Accommodates up to 10 persons
  • 3 floors
  • Down floor: bedroom – bathroom – kitchen – storage room
  • 1st floor: living room, dining room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom
  • 2nd floor: 2 bedrooms – bathroom
  • Fully equiped kitchen (oven, fridge, dishwasher, coffee machine, microwave, laundry)
  • 2 slots private parking
  • East coast sea view
items.seo_title: Sea View Villa | Rooms | A&V Luxury Villa
items.seo_description: The Sea View Villa has 220 sq.m of interior space, with 4 bedrooms & 3 bathrooms on 3 levels. 2 fully-equipped kitchens. Outdoor swimming pool with sea views.

items.title: White Harmony Suites Santorini
items.description: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori. IN A TRADITIONAL SETTLEMENT OF THE ISLAND, MEGALOCHORI, 4 BRAND NEW SUITES OFFER LUXURY AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION IN NATURE. They have been created with utmost respect to the environment, following the traditional Theran architecture with modern touches of supreme aesthetics. Bright colors are prevalent in decor, reflecting natural light bathing their interior. Two of them come with exterior Jacuzzi, while the rest have access to a private swimming pool. The luxurious amenities and the cordial services create the idyllic atmosphere and ensure the optimal holiday experience for you. White Harmony Suites is the ultimate destination of relaxation in santorini. Let us introduce you to unpretentious luxury’ splendidly combined with the island’s natural beauty and its unique character.

items.title: Art Hotel Santorini
items.description: Art Hotel in Pyrgos village in Santorini adopted Vincent Van Gogh words in order to paint the dream hotel: “I dream my painting and then I paint my dream”. For adults and gay oriented, Art hotel is design for those who love elegance, luxury, style and they are passionate for discovering the art. Art Hotel has elegant minimalistic all-white suites highlighting the artworks within each room. At the hotel you will also find a reception that is available 24 hours a day. As for the children? You are most encouraged to leave them back home for a few days and feel the carefree breeze of Santorini with nothing getting in the way! The elegant buildings stretch round the refreshing central swimming pool, promoting a private environment where the guests can mingle and get to know one another in the most wonderful atmosphere while on vacations. Socialising is part of the decor and those who are interested in meeting new and fascinating people are going to love Art Hotel.
items.excerpt: Aqua Vista Hotel's Art Hotel Santorini, has elegant all-white suites, each one highlighting artworks. Bespoke services of the finest quality are available.

SEO.title: A&V Luxury Villa | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista's A&V Luxury Villa is a spacious and modern villa built on 3 levels with an outstanding sea view infinity pool. Perfect for family gatherings!
